revised_title: Boundary Conditions for Plate Theory: A Revisit
tldr: The authors derived boundary conditions for plate theory by using a variational formulation of three-dimensional elasticity. They focused on the interior solution expansion without considering the edge-zone solution expansion. The study complements Goodier's system of differential equations with a corresponding system of boundary conditions, improving the classical approximate interior solution.
scientific_discipline: Engineering and Technology > Mechanics and Materials
